response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business in ways that are truly unparalleled. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details to ensure a smooth transaction. I look forward to the possibility of working together on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 950000}
